.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataPager extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor, class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor
Public Class DataPager Inherits Control Implements IAttributeAccessor, ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor, INamingContainer
public ref class DataPager : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IAttributeAccessor, System::Web::UI::INamingContainer, System::Web::UI::WebControls::ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor
type DataPager = class inherit Control interface IAttributeAccessor interface INamingContainer interface ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor

summary.span: 为实现 接口的数据绑定控件（例如 控件）提供分页功能。

span.span: Provides paging functionality for data-bound controls that implement the interface, such as the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [页导航字段Pager Fields](#pager_fields) - [页面属性Page Properties](#page_properties) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 类用于页数据并显示数据绑定控件可实现的导航控件接口。The class is used to page data and to display navigation controls for data-bound controls that implement the interface. (实现接口的控件的一个示例是控件。)(An example of a control that implements the interface is the control.) 您可以将相关联控件与使用数据绑定控件属性。You can associate the control with the data-bound control by using the property. 或者，可以将数据绑定控件层次结构中的控件。Alternatively, you can put the control inside the data-bound control hierarchy. 例如，在控件，可以将放控件内部模板。For example, in the control, you can put the control inside the template. 你可以自定义通过更改为每个数据页显示的项数属性。You can customize the number of items that are displayed for each page of data by changing the property. 您还可以更改在提交页的方式为服务器设置属性。You can also change the way a page is submitted to the server by setting the property. ## 页导航字段Pager Fields 为了使控件显示导航控件，必须将页导航字段添加到控件。In order for the control to display navigation controls, you must add pager fields to the control. 派生自的页导航字段类。The pager fields derive from the class. 下表列出了可以使用的页导航字段类型。The following table lists the pager field types that you can use. |页导航字段类型Pager field type|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||使用户可以一次导航页一页或跳转到第一个或最后一个页面。Enables users to navigate through pages one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page.| ||使用户可以选择按页号。Enables users to select a page by page number.| ||可以创建自定义分页 UI。Enables you to create a custom paging UI.| 若要以声明方式添加到的页导航字段控件中，添加`Fields`元素控件。To declaratively add pager fields to the control, add a `Fields` element to the control. 然后可以添加到的页导航字段`Fields`元素。You can then add the pager fields to the `Fields` element. 页导航字段添加到集合中出现的顺序`Fields`元素。The pager fields are added to the collection in the order that they appear in the `Fields` element. 集合使你能够以编程方式管理中的页导航字段控件。The collection enables you to programmatically manage the pager fields in the control. ## 页面属性Page Properties 下表列出了的只读属性指定特征的数据的页的控件。The following table lists read-only properties of the control that specify characteristics of the page of data. 这些属性通常用于绑定表达式中的对象。These properties are usually used for binding expressions in the object. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||为每个数据页显示的最大记录数。The maximum number of records that are displayed for each page of data.| ||在数据页上显示的第一条记录的索引。The index of the first record that is displayed on a page of data.| ||基础数据源中可用的记录的总数。The total number of records that are available in the underlying data source.| ## 可访问性Accessibility 呈现此控件的默认值的默认标记可能不符合可访问性标准，例如 Web 内容辅助功能准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级为 1 指导原则。The default markup that is rendered default for this control might not comply with accessibility standards, such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 有关此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                          ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何添加分页功能到控件。The following example shows how to add paging functionality to a control. 此示例包含两个使用的控件进行分页的相同数据控件。This example contains two controls that are used to page through data of the same control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager/CS/DataPagerCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager/VB/DataPagerVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要动态添加控制转移到一个页面，创建一个新对象。To dynamically add a control to a page, create a new object. 设置其属性，然后将其添加到集合的容器控件，如控件。Set its properties, and then add it to the collection of a container control, such as a control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数中动态添加到页面的控件。The following example shows how to use the constructor to dynamically add a control to a page. span.span: Connects events to event handler methods in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法指定方法的处理程序作为中指定的控件事件`container`。The method specifies the method as the handler for the event of the control specified in `container`. `container`参数必须包含实现的数据绑定控件接口，如控件。The `container` parameter must contain a data-bound control that implements the interface, such as a control. > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件。This method is primarily used by control developers to extend the control.

summary.span: 创建 控件的 属性所包含的 对象。

span.span: Creates the objects that are contained by the property of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可供属性和通过方法创建包含的对象属性。The method is used by the property and by the method to create the objects that are contained by the property. 此方法调用方法来创建用户界面 (UI) 控件的每个字段集合中。This method calls the method to create the user interface (UI) controls for each field in the collection. 在中创建的页导航字段控件中显示的页导航字段的顺序集合。The pager fields are created in the control in the order that the pager fields appear in the collection. 下表显示页导航字段类派生自类，可以创建在控件。The following table shows the pager field classes that derive from the class and that can be created in the control. |页导航字段类型Pager field type|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||使用户能够一次一页数据的页之间导航，或跳转到第一个或最后一个数据页。Enables users to navigate through pages of data one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page of data.| ||使用户能够选择通过页码的数据页。Enables users to select a page of data by page number.| ||可以创建自定义分页 UI。Enables you to create a custom paging UI.|

summary.span: 将 控件及其所有子控件绑定到数据源。

span.span: Binds the control and all its child controls to a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现方法重写基类实现。This implementation of the method overrides the base class implementation. 重写的方法验证已绑定到数据源之前创建的所有子控件。The overridden method verifies that all child controls have been created before binding them to a data source.

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象表示在 控件中指定的页导航字段。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that represent the pager fields that are specified in a control.

value.span: 包含 控件中所指定的所有页导航字段的集合对象。

span.span: A collection object that contains all the pager fields that are specified in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中显示的页导航字段控件中显示的页导航字段的顺序集合。The pager fields are displayed in the control in the order that the pager fields appear in the collection. 下表显示页导航字段类派生自类，可在集合。The following table shows the pager field classes that derive from the class and that can be used in the collection. |页导航字段类型Pager field type|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||使用户能够一次一页数据的页之间导航，或跳转到第一个或最后一个数据页。Enables users to navigate through pages of data one page at a time, or to jump to the first or last page of data.| ||使用户能够选择通过页码的数据页。Enables users to select a page of data by page number.| ||可以创建自定义分页 UI。Enables you to create a custom paging UI.| 若要以声明方式指定的页导航字段控件，放`Fields`元素内的控件。To declaratively specify the pager fields for a control, put a `Fields` element inside the control. 然后可以列出你想要包括的开始和结束之间的页导航字段``标记。You can then list the pager fields you want to include between the opening and closing `` tags. 你可以以编程方式添加到的页导航字段集合。You can programmatically add pager fields to the collection. 但是，很方便地列出的页导航字段中以声明方式控件。However, it is easier to list the pager fields declaratively in the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式将添加到的页导航字段的集合控件。The following example shows how to declaratively add pager fields to the collection of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField/CS/DataPagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField/VB/DataPagerFieldVB.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何使用属性将动态添加对象传递给控件。The following example shows how to use the property to dynamically add a object to a control. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分构造函数。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor/CS/NextPreviousPagerFieldCtorCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPreviousPagerField.Ctor/VB/NextPreviousPagerFieldCtorVB.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 检索与 控件关联的数据绑定控件。

span.span: Retrieves the data-bound control that is associated with the control.

returns.span: 与 控件关联的数据绑定控件。

span.span: The data-bound control that is associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索到的数据绑定控件引用包含的数据的数据源对象的控制页。The data-bound control retrieved by this method references a data source object that contains the data that the control pages. 有关控制能够页此数据，数据绑定控件必须实现接口。For the control to be able to page this data, the data-bound control must implement the interface. 方法检查是否属性设置为数据绑定控件的 ID。The method checks whether the property is set to the ID of a data-bound control. 如果未设置属性，方法转到的命名容器，以查找数据绑定控件在堆栈上。If the property is not set, the method goes up the stack of naming containers to look for a data-bound control. 例如，如果控件位于的模板控件，属性没有设置。For example, if the control is inside the template of a control, the property does not have to be set. 这是因为方法来自动查找通过检查控件树的控件。This is because the method can automatically find the control by examining the control tree.

exception.span: 未在页面上找到实现 接口的控件。

span.span: A control that implements the interface was not found on the page.
-or-

exception.span: 属性指定的控件未实现 接口。

span.span: The control specified by the property does not implement the interface.
-or-
The control does not have a naming container.
ListView Web Server Control

span.span: Restores view-state information for the control that was saved by the method during a previous page request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要供[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is primarily used by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当通过此方法通知，Web 服务器控件必须执行，才能创建并设置实例的任何初始化步骤。When notified by this method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required in order to create and set up an instance. 在服务器控件的生命周期的此阶段，控件的视图状态未尚未被填充。In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's view state has not yet been populated. 此外，不能访问其他服务器控件时调用此方法，不管它是子级或到此控件的父级。Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 要创建并可供访问，不保证具有其他服务器控件。Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还可使派生的类处理事件，而不必附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当您重写在派生类中，请确保调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, make sure that you call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.
ListView Web Server Control

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知服务器控件，它应执行操作所共有的页与之关联的每个 HTTP 请求。The method notifies the server control that it should perform actions that are common to each HTTP request for the page that it is associated with. 在此阶段在页生命周期中，服务器控件层次结构中的创建和初始化。At this stage in the page life cycle, server controls in the hierarchy are created and initialized. 还原视图状态，并且窗体控件反映了从客户端发送的值。View state is restored, and form controls reflect values that were posted from the client. 此实现还调用方法来查找容器控件实现接口，并且初始化页属性。This implementation also invokes the method to find the container control that implements the interface, and it initializes the page properties. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还可使派生的类处理事件，而不必附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

exception.span: 未找到实现 接口的容器控件。

span.span: A container control that implements the interface was not found.

para.span: 当您重写在派生类中，请确保调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, make sure that you call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将引发事件在其基础数据源中的记录总数不可用。The control raises the event when the total number of records in its underlying data source is available. 方法是此事件的处理程序，负责更新与页面相关属性并重新创建页导航字段对象。The method is a handler for this event and is responsible for updating the page-related properties and recreating the pager field objects.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个控件的 ，该控件包含的数据将由 控件进行分页。

span.span: Gets or sets the of the control that contains the data that will be paged by the control.

value.span: 一个控件的 ，该控件包含的数据将由 控件进行分页。

span.span: The of the control that contains the data that will be paged by the control.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default is an empty string, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定包含的数据将通过进行分页的控件控件。Use the property to specify the of the control that contains the data that will be paged by the control. 指定的控件必须实现接口，并且必须使用相同的命名容器控件。The specified control must implement the interface and must use the same naming container as the control. 您可以指定控件的一个示例是控件。An example of a control that you can specify is the control. 如果此属性为空字符串或`null`，则控制检查它的容器控件是否实现接口。If this property is an empty string or `null`, the control checks whether its container control implements the interface. 例如，在控件，属性不需要进行设置： 如果您将放控件内部模板。For example, in the control, the property does not have to be set if you put the control inside the template. 这是因为控件来自动查找通过检查控件树的控件。This is because the control can automatically find the control by examining the control tree. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性将动态关联控件，其控件。The following example shows how to use the property to dynamically associate a control with a control. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分构造函数。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Ctor/CS/DataPagerCtorCS.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.Ctor/VB/DataPagerCtorVB.aspx#2)] 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式设置中的属性控件中页的数据以控件。The following example shows how to declaratively set the property in a control in order to page the data of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID/CS/DataPagerPagedControlIDCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PagedControlID/VB/DataPagerPagedControlIDVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置为每个数据页显示的记录数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of records that are displayed for each page of data.

value.span: 为每个数据页显示的记录数。

span.span: The number of records that are displayed for each page of data.
The default is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的数据页的大小。Use the property to specify the size of a page of data. 如果有多个绑定到同一页中的控件控件，请务必设置为相同的值的这些控件的属性。If you have multiple controls in a page that are bound to the same control, be sure to set the property of these controls to the same value. 如果控件被设置为使用不同的页面大小，最后一个要初始化的控件将确定的实际页面大小控件。If the controls are set to use different page sizes, the last control to be initialized determines the actual page size of the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式设置中的属性控件以及如何动态更改其值。The following example shows how to declaratively set the property in a control and how to dynamically change its value. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize/CS/DataPagerPageSizeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.PageSize/VB/DataPagerPageSizeVB.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 属性被设置为小于 1 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value less than 1.

MemberSignature.Value: public string QueryStringField { get; set; }
.property instance string QueryStringField
Public Property QueryStringField As String
public: property System::String ^ QueryStringField { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.QueryStringField : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置查询字符串字段的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the query string field.

value.span: 查询字符串字段的名称。

span.span: The name of the query string field.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串，指示 控件将使用 HTTP POST 命令在页面中导航。

span.span: The default is an empty string, which indicates that the control will use a HTTP POST command to navigate through the pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的控件使用 HTTP GET 命令来在页之间导航。Use the property to specify that the control uses an HTTP GET command to navigate through the pages. 在 GET 请求中包含名称/值对的查询字符串字段添加到页面的 URL。In GET requests, a query string field that consists of a name/value pair is added to the URL of the page. 使用设置名称属性。The name is set by using the property. 值是对应的页码。The value is the corresponding page number. 如果为空字符串或`null`，该控件使用的 HTTP POST 命令以在页之间导航。If is an empty string or `null`, the control uses an HTTP POST command to navigate through the pages. 设置此属性时很有用，如果你想要具有由搜索引擎编制索引的数据的所有页面。Setting this property is useful if you want to have all the pages of data indexed by a search engine. 发生这种情况是因为该控件生成的每个数据页的不同 URL。This occurs because the control produces a different URL for each page of data. 当您将设置属性，可能会满足以下条件：When you set the property, the following conditions might apply: - 有多个控制在页面和它们引用相同的数据绑定控件。You have more than one control in a page and they reference the same data-bound control. 在这种情况下，请确保属性的这些控件设置为相同的值。In that case, make sure that the property of these controls is set to the same value. - 有多个控制在页面和它们引用不同的数据绑定控件。You have more than one control in a page and they reference different data-bound controls. 在这种情况下，请确保属性的这些控件设置为不同的值。In that case, make sure that the property of these controls is set to different values. 如果您设置控件为相同的值相关联的数据绑定控件将进行分页在同一时间，因为它们将使用相同的查询字符串字段。If you set the controls to the same value, the associated data-bound controls will be paginated at the same time, because they will use the same query-string field. 如果不遵循前面的准则，可能发生意外的分页行为。If you do not follow the previous guidelines, unexpected paging behavior can occur. 但是，该控件将不引发任何异常。However, no exception will be thrown by the control. 如果属性不是空字符串或`null`的值的属性或忽略的对象。If property is not an empty string or `null`, the value of the property of or objects is ignored. 在这种情况下，这些对象使用控件创建它们的导航按钮。In that case, these objects use the control to create their navigation buttons. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式设置中的属性以便使用查询字符串在页之间导航的控件。The following example shows how to declaratively set the property in a control in order to navigate through the pages by using a query string. 此示例包含两个使用的控件进行分页的数据的显示由单个控件。This example contains two controls that are used to page through the data that is displayed by a single control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField/CS/DataPagerQueryStringFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPager.QueryStringField/VB/DataPagerQueryStringFieldVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: Saves the state of the properties in the control that must be persisted between postbacks, even when the property is set to .

returns.span: 返回 控件的当前视图状态。

span.span: Returns the current view state of the control.

returns.span: 如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态，则此方法返回 。

MemberSignature.Value: protected override object SaveViewState ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance object SaveViewState() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function SaveViewState () As Object
protected: override System::Object ^ SaveViewState();

summary.span: 保存自页回发到服务器后发生的任何 控件视图状态更改。

span.span: Saves any changes to an control's view-state that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 返回 控件的当前视图状态。

span.span: Returns the control's current view state.

returns.span: 如果没有与该控件关联的视图状态，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图状态是累积的服务器控件的属性的值。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动放置在服务器控件的属性，它是实例的类。These values are automatically put in the server control's property, which is an instance of the class. 然后此属性的值保存到一个字符串对象后的服务器控件生存期的保存状态阶段中。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 保存视图状态时，此字符串对象是存储在页中隐藏的元素中的变量作为发送到浏览器。When view state is saved, this string object is sent to the browser as a variable that is stored in a hidden element in the page. 当创建自定义服务器控件时，可以通过重写此方法并修改服务器控件的提高效率`ViewState`属性。When you create custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying the server control's `ViewState` property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 此方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件。This method is primarily used by control developers to extend the control.

span.span: ListView Web Server Control

summary.span: 将 控件的特性设置为指定的名称和值。

span.span: Sets an attribute of the control with the specified name and value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

summary.span: 在设计时创建 控件的子控件。

span.span: Creates the child controls of the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法实现的设计器控件在设计时重新创建控件的子控件。The method enables a designer for the control to re-create the control's child controls at design time. 接口方法调用方法，其中包含的实际实现，并可由控件开发人员扩展其。The interface method invokes the method, which contains the actual implementation and which can be extended by control developers.

summary.span: 获取用于呈现 控件的 HTML 元素。

span.span: Gets the HTML element that is used to render the control.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的 HTML 元素，可供方法来编写的相应标记控件。The property returns an HTML element that is used by the method to write the appropriate markup for the control. 此属性重写基实现始终返回。This property overrides the base implementation to always return . > [!NOTE] > 此属性主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件。This property is primarily used by control developers to extend the control.

para.span: 您可以重写此属性以指定的用于派生的控件值。

span.span: You can override this property to specify which value to use for a derived control.

summary.span: 跟踪 控件的视图状态更改，以便可以将这些更改存储在该控件的 对象中。

span.span: Tracks view-state changes to the control so that they can be stored in the control's object.

summary.span: 可以通过 属性访问此对象。

span.span: This object can be accessed through the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结束时自动调用方法中的事件控件的生命周期。The method is called automatically at the end of the event in the control's life cycle. 此方法的警报以监视更改的 ASP.NET服务器控件的视图状态。This method alerts ASP.NET to monitor changes to the server control's view state.

span.span: ListView Web Server Control
